content:
I am looking for a method to associate a test to a specimen. When de SR consists of multiple specimens and you have multiple Tests to fullfill, how can I be shure that the test is executed on the right specimen?
It's about an IG for laboratory orders.
@Marcel Hanselmann i suggest you ask this in the Order and Observations stream, this stream is more about the 'technical' creations of IG's
Marcel Hanselmann has marked this topic as resolved.
